reviewText: I enjoy erotic things, but most pornography is either too stupid or too embarrassing for me to watch more than a few minutes. Not this one. The acting is superb, the people look realistic, and the sex is actually tasteful and necessary. There is indeed a plot here, and the actors not only follow it, they make it interesting. I also loved the music. I cannot recommend this enough. This is a wonderful movie to watch even if you dislike the genre. I enjoyed it thoroughly.
